articles.title: BTS’ Suga mobilises global ARMY to raise over 200 million won in 24 hours with one quiet, heartfelt gesture
articles.description: BTS member Suga donated ₩5 billion and helped design a music-based therapy program for autistic children. Fans worldwide joined in, raising ₩200 million within hours to support the Min Yoongi Treatment Centre.

articles.title: Heroic dad jumps off Disney cruise ship to save his daughter after she falls from 4th deck
articles.description: A father leaped off a Disney cruise ship to rescue his daughter who fell from the fourth deck. The incident occurred as the ship was returning to Fort Lauderdale, Florida, after a Bahamas cruise.

articles.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank branch manager siphoned off Rs 31 crore of public money to gamble; Know how he misused customer’s KYC details
articles.description: A Kotak Mahindra Bank branch manager in Bihar stole over Rs 31 crore of public funds to fuel his gambling addiction. He forged signatures on government cheques and laundered the money through foreign gaming apps, misusing customers' KYC details to open 21 accounts.
